description.original: Open a specified note, canvas, or workspace on startup, or set it for quick access later.
description.translation: 在启动时打开指定的笔记、画布或工作区，或设置以便后续快速访问。

dict.Notice(\"Copied homepage debug informati: Notice("将主页调试信息复制到剪贴板")
dict.Notice(\"Homepage cannot be opened due t: Notice("由于插件不可用，主页无法打开")
dict.Notice(`Cannot find the workspace \"${th: Notice(`找不到工作空间 "${this.data.value}" 作为主页`)
dict.text:\"The plugin required for this home: text:"此主页类型所需的插件不可用"
dict.text:`This setting has been disabled, as: text:`此设置已被禁用，因为它与每日笔记不兼容' "在启动时打开每日笔记" 功能。要使用它，请禁用“每日笔记”设置`
dict.text:\"Select commands that will be exec: text:"选择打开主页时要执行的命令."
dict.text:\"If this vault is synced using uno: text:"如果使用非官方服务同步此保险库，则可能导致内容被覆盖"
dict..setDesc(\"For mobile devices, store the: .setDesc("对于移动设备，单独存储主页及其设置。")
dict..addToggle(\"Open on startup\",\"When la: .addToggle("启动时打开","当Obsidian启动时, 打开主页.","openOnStartup",d=>this.display())
dict..addToggle(\"Open when empty\",\"When th: .addToggle("为空时打开","当标签页为空时，打开主页.","openWhenEmpty")
dict..addToggle(\"Use when opening normally\": .addToggle("打开时应用设置","当主页正常打开时，应用主页设置，比如从链接或文件管理器打开","alwaysApply")
dict..addDropdown(\"Opening method\",\"Determ: .addDropdown("开启方式","确定启动时现有选项卡和视图如何受到影响。"
dict..addDropdown(\"Manual opening method\",\: .addDropdown("确定启动时现有选项卡和视图如何受到影响。","确定使用命令或功能区按钮打开时对现有选项卡和视图的影响。"
dict..addToggle(\"Hide release notes\",\"Neve: .addToggle("隐藏发行说明","Obsidian更新时从不显示发行说明。"
dict..addToggle(\"Auto-create\",\"When the ho: .addToggle("自动创建","当主页不存在时，创建一个带有其名称的注释。"
dict..addToggle(\"Revert view on close\",\"Wh: .addToggle("关闭时恢复视图","离开主页时，恢复默认视图。"
dict..addToggle(\"Auto-scroll\",\"When openin: .addToggle("自动滚动","打开主页时，滚动到底部并专注于最后一行。"
dict..addToggle(\"Refresh Dataview\",\"Always: .addToggle("刷新数据视图","打开主页时，始终尝试重新加载Dataview视图。"
dict.\"Nothing will occur by default. Any com: "默认情况下不会发生任何事情。添加的任何命令仍将生效。"
dict.\"A random note or canvas from your Obsi: "将从您的Obsidian文件夹中随机选择一个笔记或白板。"
dict.\"Your Daily Note or Periodic Daily Note: "将使用您的日记或定期日记。"
dict.i.Default=\"Default view\",i.Reading=\"R: i.Default="默认视图",i.Reading="阅读视图",i.Source="编辑视图（源码）",i.LivePreview="编辑视图（实时预览）"
dict.\"Enter a folder. A random note or canva: "输入文件夹路径，系统将从中随机选择一个笔记或画布。"
dict.\"When launching Obsidian, open the home: "启动 Obsidian 时自动打开主页"
